channel.title: The numbers to skills...What are they all?
channel.description:
I just wanted to know what are the skill numbers..To explain a bit better the mining is 14 and i think def was 1 or sumthing so could any1 tell me a list of them all?
I want too to know if the list is same for 508 and 317??because if not then i only want the 508!

item.title: The numbers to skills...What are they all?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Yes, they are the same for 317 and 508, 508 just has Summoning, Hunter, and Construction which 317 does not.

King Lingerz’s List:

0 is Attack 1 is Defence 2 is Strength 3 is Hitpoints 4 is Ranging 5 is Prayer 6 is Magic 7 is Cooking 8 is Woodcutting 9 is Fletching 10 is Fishing 11 is Firemaking 12 is Crafting 13 is Smithing 14 is Mining 15 is Herblore 16 is Agility 17 is Thieving 18 is Slayer 19 is Farming 20 is Runecrafting 21 is Construction 22 is Hunter 23 is Summoning

Read full topic
item.source: The numbers to skills...What are they all?
